website_summaries.verdict: Classic, sturdy, and versatile. These shoes are meant for daily wear, and they can take it.
pros: Comes in brown, black and navy

customer_reviews.title: Deserves A Zero Star Review!
customer_reviews.text: Though my daughter loved the look and feel of these shoes, after one day of wearing the black dye started coming off....not just on the shoe, but the black dye transferred to her socks! It's so bad that if I rub a paper towel along the side of the shoe, it will also turn black. Very poor quality, bought just over a month ago for school that started this week, and after one day of wearing they're going to be donated! Might wind up calling Stride Rite directly, to see if I have any recourse.
customer_reviews.author: C.I.

customer_reviews.title: VERY CHEAPLY MADE KNOCK OFF
customer_reviews.text: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY. PAID $40 FOR THIS PIECE OF JUNK AND THE AMOUNT OF SCUFF MARKS WITHING THE FIRST 2 WEEKS OF SCHOOL ALONE WERE DISGUSTING. I tried shoe polish on it afterwards but to no avail. This is very cheaply made and poor quality. I had to get another pair off Payless for my daughter a month later for half the price. They lasted the balance of the ENTIRE SCHOOL YEAR (2 and a half terms) She can probably wear them again this year, but i like her wearing new stuff first day of school. DON'T BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: Malika

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: In just a few weeks of school and the shoe color is fading and seems as if they have been used for the entire year.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for this price point. Don't pay full price or you'll be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Four months and toe broke open. Not happy because these aren't inexpensive so they should wear better than that. Also I had to polish often because color fades fast. I won't get these again and I'm disappointed in stride right. This isn't the quality I normally get from them. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Certainly not everyday knock around shoes. Avoid the blue version.
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers have experienced, the blue Mary Janes fade out very quickly and are overly prone to scuffing. Coupled with unreasonable sole wear, they look trashed after a single week. I'm debating on whether it is worth the hassle of re-dying them a darker color or tracking down navy blue polish, but for $50 I expect a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Consume!!!

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: The black finish is holding up much better than the blue did last year. The shoe itself holds up well to daily school wear. It's comfortable and secure while dressy enough for her school dresses. Last year we got the blue and most of the finish had come off the toes by the end of the first day...and finding blue shoe polish proved impossible...every order of it just got backordered over and over. We will order black from now. We will order again each year as long as our girls fit in them.
customer_reviews.author: mandm

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe for uniform, just wish it held up better!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for a school uniform. Our daughter, however is rough on shoes apparently or these don’t hold up that great. One week in and she’s totally scuffed up the front of these. For the price, I would have expected them to hold up better. They do have an adorable style to them, look great upon arrival, and she says they are comfortable. They have an adjustable Velcro as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea Cozadd

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and loved
customer_reviews.text: These shoes need shined, as they are real leather. But our daughter loves the shoes and wears them all the time! The last pair we ordered a little big, but they lasted about a year and a half. She finally scuffed up the front top when playing and we decided to order the same pair again! Kudos to Stride Rite for making shoes that hold up to kids.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These have only been worn for a few weeks and only Mon through Fri - seriously... Very disappointed that the material does not last... Last school year, this is what her uniform shoes looked like after nine months...!
customer_reviews.author: MissDetroitLA

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, Durable Girls shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are not as durable as the Sketchers mary janes, but it was the best I could find for my daughter at the time. The leather starts to show wear early, but they hold together well. The soles are better than Sketchers, so that part has lasted the longest....at least until she grew out of them. That is saying a lot, since this kid really tears up shoes by climbing trees and running with the dogs in the mud.....not a girlie-girls, this one!
customer_reviews.author: CJones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes for school -- stylish, sturdy, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Stride Rite provides an excellent quality shoe, but Amazon provided an even better price! I paid less than $15 for these shoes. These shoes are high quality leather mary-janes with a rubber sole. I purchased them as uniform shoes for school, and they did not disappoint. They have a thick rubber sole to provide comfort and stability, and a supple leather upper to withstand everyday use and roughness to the shoe. The inside has a soft, cushiony lining. I expect these shoes to last through the school year and still be in great shape for my younger child to use as a hand-me down.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow and stiff
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for my daughter who has wide feet. She normally wears See Kai Run canvas Mary Jane-style shoes, which are just wide enough, but we were looking for something a little wider. The 1.5W in this shoe is actually quite a bit narrower than the regular 1.5 See Kai Run shoe and much stiffer. My daughter found it too uncomfortable to even try both shoes on. I suggest ordering a double wide if your child has wide feet, or skipping entirely. The length seemed correct.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sankin

customer_reviews.title: Stride Rite doesn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Stride rite does not disappoint. This is the second year I purchase these rugged yet adorable shoes for my 6 year old. They allow for running/jumping as well as matching her uniform jumper. Do not be dissuaded by other reviewers about the color fading. These are genuine leather shoes. Good leather shoes need a shoe polish every now and again. My daughters shoes became faded and such, too. With a bit of navy shoe polish they look as good as new... but already comfortable and shaped to her tootsie.
customer_reviews.author: melisa elson

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes for my kid to wear all day at ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes for my kid to wear all day at school. The bones of the shoe are durable and seem to be comfortable for my six year old. The only negative thing about these shoes...do not expect them to keep their color. After only a week of recess time outside the black rubs off on the toes quite quickly. We had a dark blue pair before and they started to look horrible, as well. The only reason I bought a second pair is because of the comfort it provides my kid, which to me is more important.
customer_reviews.author: Rollerderby Lover

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny - will be buying again!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I got these for my 3 year old to wear to preschool. She loved them so much that they became her go-to shoe for everything! A year later, they barely look like they have any wear and tear. I also love that they come in wide sizes - and it doesn't hurt that they are adorable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: I have bought this model for 6 years in a row
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand and model for my daughter since she was 7 and know She's 12 . This is very wel made pair of shoes and man they are resistant !! I have change them only because her feet grows every year but she barely scratches them after a whole school year . I am very pleased with the brand and model , it's a shame that she has grown up and this brand is only for kids
customer_reviews.author: clara Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable - perfect for school uniform even during PE
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes and perfect for school uniform. The color will fade in front if teared by the harsh use of kids during recess, but using a navy blue shoe polish will save it easily, as it did for us. My daughter tried different brands and they didn't last longer that this one and were much less comfortable. She always complained on other shoes about the top front that was too tied and she loves these shoes. She even told me that she can run "super fast" with them...
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, not sure they are durable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes as part of a school uniform. The shoes cute and comfortable! My daughter has been wearing them for two weeks (not daily) and shares that she likes them because they don’t hurt her feet. The only downside is that the front of the shoe is peeling. It hasn’t happened yet to the other shoes she’s wearing (another brand) so I am not sure if this is a fluke or if they are sensitive to everyday wear and tear. Overall, they look old and it’s been about two weeks of using them, again not daily. Again, they are great shoes for comfort. Durability not so much. This is our first purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Garza

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are adorable. BUT they run somewhat narrow and after seeing ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are adorable. BUT they run somewhat narrow and after seeing how easily the unprotected toe area of the shoe shows wear and literal tears, I couldn't justify keeping them (plus the size I ordered was larger than expected even though I went by our current pairs of Stride Rite shoes). I have learned after four children that in order to get full use of our investment in Stride Rites, it is smart to only order shoes with the rubber toe... Except their suede or nubuck boots. They are pretty durable in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes, order wide if childs foot is not narrow
customer_reviews.text: 3rd grade, One pair every year.. I order them in November, December every year going up one size... One of my twin girls has a more narrow foot and my other little one has wide.. order accordingly!.. I love these shoes with their school uniforms and they are worn daily. when they become a little scuffed, old school military black shoe dye and shine work wonders, you can shine these up to pass any inspection!
customer_reviews.author: M. SCHNEIDER

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy Mary Jane uniform/dressy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Stride Rite Claire Mary Janes for my daughter for several years. This is a cute, comfortable, and sturdy shoe that she can wear with her school uniform during the week and to church on Sundays. Even with almost daily wear, the only reason that I have to replace her Mary Janes is because her feet have grown. I highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon H.

customer_reviews.title: The color fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these more than few times from Amazon, and definitely there are definitive quality difference between the store bought stride rite and amazon. I do not recommend unless you are getting a deep discount and fine with constantly dying the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeDiva

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in August (back to school purchase) for my very active five year old. It's December, and they're holding up beautifully. Very sturdy, tough, well-made shoes. I am very happy with my purchase and will continue to purchase these, when she outgrows the current ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Parish

customer_reviews.title: Runs tad bit small
customer_reviews.text: The 2nd turned out better than the 1st time. My daughter is currently in 12. I purchased a 13 Medium width and she complained that it was snug bith in the front and back. I returned it to get 13 1/2 Wide which is perfect. Hopefully, the leather does not fade as indicated in previous posts!
customer_reviews.author: Rémy Martin

customer_reviews.title: They're very comfortable, as comfortable as sneakers
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd pair of Claires, as my daughter is just outgrowing the last pair. They're very comfortable, as comfortable as sneakers, and my 2nd grade daughter can wear them to school all day, even for PE class where she is required to run laps. The leather is not as durable as on boys dress shoes, though, and gets scuffed up, especially in the sand box, but that may be true for all girls dress shoes; A little polish and they're OK again. And they're velcro, which at size 3, is hard to find in comfy shoes, so they're quick to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Mary Jane
customer_reviews.text: These are great Mary Janes for school. Very nice, quality leather that holds upwell over the course of a year though the shoes take a beating. Bought two pairs this time so she can just go from one pair the next. I particuarly like that the shoes have good support and a solid sole. Can't get a better school shoe. Update: Just got two more pairs. She's going to age out of these at Size 5 :(. We will miss them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Manor

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The product fits well as most Stride Rites do, however after a week of wear, the shoes are horribly weathered. She got a pair of uniform shoes from Target too and they have held up better. She does wear them on the play ground, but I’m very disappointed in the quality. If amazon will let me return them I absolutely will.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are OK.
customer_reviews.text: Where the strap attaches the sides of the shoe come up so high that they cut into the foot when you affix the strap to the velcro strip. Am hoping they will "soften" up with wear so they don't cut into the foot quite so bad.
customer_reviews.author: grandmaoc

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for back to school
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. For a size 1 they were slightly small because we bought half size bigger than the normal size, thinking the child would have the beginning of the school year to grow into them, but they fit perfectly right now. We are keeping them because school starts this week but I was surprised about the sizing. If I had known, we would have bought size 1.5. Its still a great shoe, comfortable, and looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Stride Rite!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old for her first pair of school shoes. You can't go wrong with Stride Rite shoes! She has just outgrown all her size 9 shoes and size 10 is still too big. I bought these in an 9.5 and they fit her perfectly with a pair of socks and she has a little room to grow in them too. She loves them, they are comfortable. They are super durable and very well made, and I love the dark colored sole on the shoe - it won't show dirt from the playground easily.
customer_reviews.author: MommaK

customer_reviews.title: My kid wore this for a year for her kindergarten. I am ordering the next pair for her first grade!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am putting 4 stars instead of 5 is because it gets scratched pretty fast. But the durability of the shoes as such is amazing ! My little one wore it for a years. It did look scratches but she never complained about the shoes bothering her .
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as my daughter's school shoes. She's in preschool. I love them. They're soft inside and I think comfortable because she has not complained about wearing them and it's been a month. I will definitely purchase another pair when she outgrows her current size.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality! Fit as they should, comfy. And she can easily fasten. Look good for school, and dressy too. Versatile. 4/1/2016 Worn almost daily to school, and are also worn as play shoes. She wears them all the time because they don't hurt her feet. As to wear, the soles are intact, no significant wear. The tops look good after a coat of black shoe polish, from time to time, the velcro just needs spiffing up - I use a pin to de-fuzz. These have a good year left in them, but are outgrown, that's why the addendum, I am on here as I just now bought a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: GeorginaK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful school shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were perfect. Needed navy shoes for school uniform policy. These were exactly what I needed. Fit slightly big, and that’s exactly what I wanted to get the full years worth out of the shoe. Easy enough for my daughter to put on herself and are made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sesalee Maffeo

customer_reviews.title: Leather surface is not durable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe shows more than normal wear and tear. It is meant for a preschool aged child, which should be more durable than it is. I have had to use shoe polish every week for the past month and the shoe has only been worn for school since August. For the money spent I should not have to use corrective measures.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!  Sturdy, comfortable and meets school requirements -my daughter actually LOVES them.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is horribly particular about shoes- and these, she LOVES. She has a pretty wide foot for a 5 1/2 year old and most shoes are too narrow. These shoes are great- I actually bought a second pair. They are sturdy, hold up to her rough play (which most haven't), and she isn't quick to take them off the second she gets home. She puts in a long day (attends private school). Unlike other kindergarten schools, she goes from 8-3 with an after school program until 5:00- so she is in these shoes ALL DAY. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: RMCS-NY

customer_reviews.title: Solid uniform choice
customer_reviews.text: These are the most solid uniform shoes I was able to find for my first-grade daughter. They didn't quite make it through the whole year before she outgrew them. I tried a different brand to replace them and those scuffed and looked awful within a week. So I'm right back to Stride Rite! These shoes take a lot of use, but they are expensive to replace when your kid outgrows them so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Roland-Springer

customer_reviews.title: The best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: The best shoes ever. I had first purchased ones that I thought would be good, just a little cheaper - after 1 week they fell apart. I replaced them with these and they not only lasted the entire school year, but a little polish and they look almost like new. I ordered a new pair for this school year. They are the best and well worth the few extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect . Very sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Mine was stollen from my porch but I have had these before and they are well worth the money . You will only need two pairs if your child is ruff .. they are build great .
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: they look old already whos fault is it ???... not sure
customer_reviews.text: MY DAUGHTER SAYS THEY ARE COMFORTABLE BUT I got them for school in September and its October and they look like she been wearing them for years lol smh but in all fairness she does play rough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough to withstand the trauma of a very active child! This shoe lasted the entire school year which is pretty impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Xi'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute MJs for a young girl. My daughter has super small and slim feet and the size 8 fit OK (with socks). She is 5.5 years old and has almost flat feet so nice to see a little arch support. Not a ton of support but a little plus very durable leather which helped as well.
customer_reviews.author: BabyMama45

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great chapel shoe! This is our second pair of stride ride Mary Jane shoes. My 8 year old has very large feet for her age and I am so impressed and thankful that Stride Rite makes well-made shoes in her size. We ordered her usual 5 and they were a little big, but she will grow into them. I love how well made the leather is and how well they have held up in all conditions. Definitely a great purchase if you are needing a nice, comfortable dress show for a girl of any age :)
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Very Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are unfortunately very poorly made. The fit is great. They look great. They didn't last one month of wear. The inside started breaking down, and that's not acceptable for the price paid. Don't waste your money on these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: B4

customer_reviews.title: Bought before
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in the same size to replace her current pair which she badly scuffed in the toes. Not the shoes just her tom boy playing. Would purchase again and recommend to others. Had to order the next size up upon receipt. Same impeccable service and packaging. The return was stress free.
customer_reviews.author: Clicking Needles

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, broken box?
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came right on time, looked exactly as I expected. The box came completely smashed - I usually reuse the boxes to hold the shoes once they're outgrown till the next kid, but this box will have to be tossed because it was in such poor condition. The shoes were not affected.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coming back almost every 2 years
customer_reviews.text: These shoes last forever. My daughter wears daily for school. Her school allows only black shoes. A comfortable black pair of shoes is hard to find. They last her the whole school year plus the beginning of the new school year. Just clean and they look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely135

customer_reviews.title: Reliable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter last year and she wore them most of the school year, she attends a private school, so wears them every day. Well, those lasted, and she never had a problem. Hope these do as well, as they are the same as those.
customer_reviews.author: Lyrical Jazz Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe worth the extra money. I do recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe as it can be worn for a tennis shoe for PE but is also both dressy and casual. Good quality shoe and I believe Is worth the little extra money. It should last. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Best school shoe I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can ruin shoes faster than unbroken puppy, but these things seem to be indestructible. Good leather and made to last. They have gone through gym, recess, snow, kick ball...you name it. I will by these for all of her uniform needs.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Practical and pretty
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are holding up great after 2 months of almost daily use. They are comfy for my daughter whom has wide feet and true to size. They are not scuffing up on the tip like the black ones do. Possibly because the brown is less obvious. These are basic uniform shoes that any little girl should be comfortable in. I've been getting these for 2 years straight and love how practical they are. Plus they are at least $10 cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: windydays

customer_reviews.title: You won’t Regret buying these
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! My daughter wears shoes to the ground at school and with her slim ankle these are the only ones that have lasted months and months. Don’t bother buying cheap ones. Stick with Stride Right, you won’t regret.
customer_reviews.author: OM

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid they would be too stiff and hurt my 6yr olds feet when new but she wore them all day right away and loves them. They are sturdy and great!
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: blue color fades
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe and decided to keep. I know that one the shoe is "broken in" it will be fine to wear. However, the leather shoe fit a bit large for size ordered. The blue dye has already faded after less than 10 wears-no water. My daughter complains that the shoe is rubbing her foot a little.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: My go to uniform shoes
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very sturdy and good quality. I have been purchasing this every year for her school uniform. The only reason we get new ones is because they don't fit her anymore. The shoe is still in very good shape after almost a year of use. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: ValCan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and good quality for my children’s school shoes. However, I wish they wouldn’t look so worn so quickly. My kids both have these shoes that were bought new in September and already look very worn out on the top. They still fit very well and are good quality so I’m keeping them and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Fordham

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe for my 1st grader
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe for my 1st grader. I got these last year for her uniform she needs to wear. So i went with these again this year. The uniform shoes left her heals sore. These are comfortable and no complaints...
customer_reviews.author: K & M

customer_reviews.title: Scuff easily!
customer_reviews.text: I've been holding on to these for school to start which was this past Tuesday. I took this picture Wednesday night. I can't believe how scuffed they already are on the toes. She's in pre-k with no major activity other than 30 minutes outside....two days!! A little disappointed especially for Stride Rite shoes AND the fact they are $45!
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe for School
customer_reviews.text: I buy these quite often as my daughter tends to drag her toes on the ground. Even with that being said, the leather is thick enough that I can add some polish and clean them right up. These are a great choice for school shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are flexible and not stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, but already showing some wear after the first day of use. My daughter likes the shoes and calls them her bowling shoes. I found that the shoes seem to fit a little wide, because they will pucker on the sides a little. I like that the shoes are flexible and not stiff. The bottoms have a nice rubber surface which makes these okay for wearing for a few hours a day during play and at school.
customer_reviews.author: mother and teacher

customer_reviews.title: Stride Rite Girl
customer_reviews.text: This product was brought for my granddaughter. It fits well and looks great. I been a stride rite customer since I has my kids back in the seventies.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Andrews

customer_reviews.title: great quality and durable
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that these shoes would be harder than the last pair I got for my daughter which were the pedi pedi flex mary janes. But there have been no complaints and they aren't getting scuffed like the last pair. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kgfk

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are too large and have a possibly toxic chemical small.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were a gift and I didn't get to see them with the recipient until this week-end. They are too big and the smell of them is terrible. Smells very chemically. Now it seems that I missed the return/refund period by 2 days? I didn't know that was possible? I will be talking to Amazon about allowing these shoes to be returned and putting the charges back on our credit card.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and fit the bill for uniform shoes. They last a full school year assuming your child's foot doesn't grow. My daughter will not wear anything else to school. They have made it through snow and rain and dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: SERJERIN

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Soft leather, flexible sole and the size runs true. The strap is Velcro which is easy for little ones to adjust on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star for Stride Rite
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Mary Jane shoes to replace a pair that my granddaughter outgrew. They are durable and scuffs can be polished and buffed out of the leather. I will definitely order a larger size when she out grows these. These are a perfect match for her school uniforms.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, durable, comfy shoes for school.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cute and so sturdy. The wide size is great and roomy. The only complaint is that even though they are her size, they still pealed the back of her heels. Once broken in they are great and easy to put on and take off. They have held up very we since the start of the school year. The bottoms are not worn there is only minor scuff at the front near the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Within the first week of school the color on the front of the shoes had totally warn off. My daughter says they are comfortable but they look awful.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not that great quality
customer_reviews.text: This shoe did not last at all. The front part is completely torn up. They only lasted about 4 months. I will try and add a photo update. I have purchased from Stride Rite before and haven't had a poor quality shoe before, so not sure what happened here. My daughter wears them in school and does have a 15 minute recess to play outside, but expected a little bit better quality. Then again they were on sale, I paid 23 for them at the time.
customer_reviews.author: melissa valdez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality leather shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my daughter. Her school dress code requirement. She wore it only once. we Like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Today was my daughter's first time wearing this shoe. To my surprise I could see white stitching on the inside. I grew up wearing Stride Rite shoes so my expectations where high. I'm truly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kirkland-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to use as school shoes. I recommend if you purchase to buy the next size up
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Mom

customer_reviews.title: But like most Mary Jane the life span in finite - ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a a school shoe for my kindergartner. Fits well. Has lasted longer than most other Mary Jane since it stood up to school yard recess games. But like most Mary Jane the life span in finite - they don't usually last the entire school year. I think this likely due to the the test it is out through in the school yard.
customer_reviews.author: JosieJo

customer_reviews.title: Look worn too soon!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter to wear to school with her uniform. The shoes seem comfortable and sturdy enough but the front of the shoes especially is already looking worn and old after only 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: Great kids school shoes. Kids say they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great kids school shoes. Kids say they are comfortable and my kids outgrow them before wearing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Man

customer_reviews.title: Great school shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes lasted my daughter ALL year! They exceeded my expectations!! I have a very active 4 year old girl. I was expecting to have to get a new pair mid year from wear or from growing. I bought one full size up to start school. The shoes lasted the whole year. They did not fall apart but were definitely worn.
customer_reviews.author: Dharma Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dress shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe for school wearing on Chapel day. Great for a lil kid that can’t tie or buckle shoes
customer_reviews.author: Mickey's Friend

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are perfect for school uniforms
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for school uniforms. My daughter has had them for 4 months now, and a little black shoe shine and they're back as new every time. She will probably grow out of them before they get worn out, and that says a lot for a very active 5 year old...
customer_reviews.author: Ghounette

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying this same shoes in different size for the last two years for my daughter’s school shoes. They are durable and she described them as very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ailleen Grace

customer_reviews.title: Best school shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Best school shoe ever. This is the second pair. The first one lasted two school years but don't fit her anymore so gave them to another child and got this pair. Update. 4.5 and 5 are exactly the same shoe. See pictures. Still best shoe ever just watch for size.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Well made shoe exceeded my expectations and my granddaughter loves them absolute plus
customer_reviews.text: 12s were a little large but I decided to keep them because I love the shoe that much it’s well-made and my granddaughter’s foot will grow I ordered a half a size smaller she loves the shoe and so do I
customer_reviews.author: Judith Powell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Stride Rite shoes are our absolute favorite. They are high quality and last until out kids outgrow them. The ability to get these in a wide size makes these an easy choice for parents of kids with chubby feet. I find that stride Rite run a little large, but it's easy to size down a half size to compensate. My only complaint is that these and another pair ordered were shipped together in a flimsy polymailer. The box arrived crushed and basically destroyed and part of the shoe had been bent in. Amazon was very quick to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: D. Waguespack

customer_reviews.title: Hope they keep making these shoesm
customer_reviews.text: Second pair bought for parochial school wear for granddaughter. She request again for current year.
customer_reviews.author: Grammie P

customer_reviews.title: Strap broken 1 week into wearing. Called company and ...
customer_reviews.text: Strap broken 1 week into wearing. Called company and had to send them pics and proof of purchase. To my surprise the sent out a brand new pair free. Down side took 15 days to get the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I've ordered for my five year old daughter. She wears them to school with her uniform every day and loves them! They are comfortable, maintain their shape and color after being broken in, and are easy for her to put on and take off on her own. I'll be ordering another pair when she grows out of these. Excellent shoe!!
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Buyer

customer_reviews.title: She Likes them!
customer_reviews.text: My niece liked the shoe. She said it didn't rub the back and felt good. I'm happy! :)
customer_reviews.author: MARGARET GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Shoes that fit and wear like iron!
customer_reviews.text: Love Stride Rite.. My 26 yr old wore them.. Now my 6 yr old wears them.. Wonderful workmanship and wear like REAL LEATHER, not the fake stuff so many other shoes are manufactured with! Will continue to purchase as she ages and needs shoes for school uniforms.. These are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes for Active Girls
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my kindergartner to wear all day at school. She never complained that her feet hurt and they last the whole second half of the year. The only issue is that my daughter loves to play on the ground so the leather on the toes began to fade, but nothing a little black shoe polish couldn't handle. They are cuter on then these pictures show.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy Shoe Polish
customer_reviews.text: The Good: These shoes fit school dress code, always fit without a break-in period, and do not fall apart before they are outgrown. The Bad: The shoe is not dyed well and the toe does not hold up to Kindergarten recess. Go ahead and throw Tarrago #116 (Deep Brown) shoe polish in your cart. You will likely need to use it every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Seatchecker

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes for school
customer_reviews.text: it fit as expected my daughter was happy after she tried them on and the price was unbeatable.will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL C.

customer_reviews.title: Play n Dress Shoes
customer_reviews.text: It is a good shoe for dresses and school. I like the materials and seems much sturdier construction from Stride Rite (SR). Lately, Stride Rite shoes have been "falling apart" before a growth spurt. Being leather, I don't have to worry about the fabric ripping (yes), staining or peeling off as I've witnessed from other SR shoes lately during normal wear. They are accurate for size too.
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for school uniform.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! Excellent quality, and have been very comfortable for my daughter. My kindergarten daughter has worn them all year almost daily for school and they are still in great condition- slightly faded, but nothing a little shoe polish can't help. I would expect some fading with 10 months of wear on an active 6 year old. I will be saving these ones for my younger daughter and buying new ones for the older for the new school year. I highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: jsbms fam

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lasted all school year. My daughter wore these everyday as part of her uniform. Still in very good condition
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really nice. They seem to be made well and my granddaughter loves them and she said they felt good.
customer_reviews.author: Nolaboo

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect and incredibly well made
customer_reviews.text: Grand Daughter was over the moon to get a pair of Mary Jane's. Locally they are twice the price and the same doggone shoe. They fit perfect and incredibly well made.
customer_reviews.author: grrrr says Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still holding strong in the school year but she doesn't wear them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: JWMarriott

customer_reviews.title: Picture included to show the utter waste of money these are
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these shoes, I expected them to last a little longer. The front of the shoes are destroyed. Picture included to show the utter waste of money these are. Purchased out of desperation because most stores were sold out of this style. I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoes I have buy it for four years ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes I have buy it for four years my dauther love them they very comfortable looks great last long 5 stars shoe
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable - dress/play/school
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and comfortable shoe . You will need a shoe buffer in the color to keep the leather looking good, but that is no big deal. The child can even do and learn to look proper for school.
customer_reviews.author: Poe Boy

customer_reviews.title: Resistant
customer_reviews.text: Very resistant to the treatments submitted by the child, they were not mistreated with rainwater, if I forgive some color, paint it again, very good shoe for an all-terrain child
customer_reviews.author: Palmira

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Claire Mary Jane (Toddler/Little Kid/Big Kid)
product_meta.description: Stride Rite designs and engineers footwear specifically to meet the needs of growing children. Stride Rite's mission is to encourage kids and support parents by developing and marketing products that help children embrace life's possibilities and adventures with confidence. Stride Rite shoes aren't like any other shoes you'll buy. They're better. With more than 85 years of experience, they've learned a few things about their craft. Stride Rite is the one company that's been helping kids run, jump, leap, grow, and playfully express themselves since 1919.
feature_bullets: FUN LITTLE KIDS' FOOTWEAR: Kick-start your school year with stylish shoes featuring cool neutral colors which complement gym-class and formal dress-codes
DURABLE AND COMFORTABLE: Premium leather with a padded collar and memory-foam insole providing enhanced comfort to little feet
ELEGANT DESIGN: Lightweight and non-marking rubber outsole for maximum flexibility; toddlers’ shoes have an easy-on, adjustable strap closure
EASY TO CLEAN: Brush off dry dirt, clean with a damp, warm cloth using a mild detergent, stuff with newspaper, and air dry

INSTANT OUTFIT-MAKER: Stride Rite celebrates childhood by bringing you kids' footwear with chic designs and vibrant colors, making them a perfect pair with casual and formal, school-going children clothing
